lines.text: Maybe we could check who the gun belongs to... if there hadn't been that fire.
Like, maybe if it belonged to the <c=#FF6000>Go Wizard,</c> it'd have some of those rune stickers on it.
But the fire would've burned those away, so that's a dead end.
Well, yeah, but- why would that work, anyway?
You think wizards just go around puttin' stickers on things for fun?
(Note to self: Leo will not be impressed if you show him your scrapbooking skills.)
